item.title: Deploy Hugo and Further
item.author: Author
item.description: Deploy Hugo and Further The following operations is based on the post, “Hugo With LoveIt Theme Configuration”, which requires you have already installed and config both Hugo and LoveIt theme. 1. Deploy Hugo on Github Assume you have already got a Github account. Create a Github Repository, name this repository as yourgithubname.github.io. Open your terminal, and cd to your blog folder. Run following command lines:
